entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of Harry's cousins who lives in the Burrow.

entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is George and Ron's home, where they live with their family.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's cousins who lives in the Burrow.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a wizard and the father of George and Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who lives with his cruel relatives, the Dursleys.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives who live in a house on Privet Drive.

relationships.description: Harry has visited the Burrow before.
George lives in the Burrow with his family.
Ron also lives in the Burrow with his family.
Mr. Weasley is looking out for Harry's well-being and trying to get him to say goodbye to the Dursleys.
Mr. Weasley disapproves of the way the Dursleys treat Harry.
